Room.Name: Back Bedroom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small and cramped back bedroom in Madame Ruthie's red house.
Room.LongDescription: This is the bedroom for quick service, and the traffic in and out is pretty heavy. There are several beds here, and even a pallet on the floor for those who can't wait. There is a strong smell of unwashed and sweaty bodies in the room, but it's not really that unpleasant. Madame Ruthie makes money by the high volume here, because even the poorest of customers can get what they came in for.
